item.title: 研究人员称，上半年加密货币黑客盗窃案翻了一番，达到 14 亿美元
item.description: 区块链研究机构 TRM Labs 周五表示，2024 年前六个月，全球因黑客攻击而被盗的加密货币数量比去年同期增加了一倍多，主要原因是少数大型攻击和加密货币价格上涨。【原文：The amount of cryptocurrency stolen in hacks globally more than doubled in the first six months of 2024 from a year earlier, driven by a small number of large attacks and rising crypto prices, blockchain researchers TRM Labs said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国 6 月就业增长放缓，失业率上升
item.description: 故事：6 月份，美国就业增长放缓，失业率升至 4.1%，仍处于健康水平，这增加了美联储在不使经济陷入衰退的情况下抑制通货膨胀的可能性。【原文：STORY: U.S. job growth slowed to a still-healthy pace in June, with the unemployment rate rising to 4.1%, increasing the chances that the Federal Reserve will be able to tame inflation without tipping the economy into recession.】

item.title: 美国股票基金因降息预期而需求旺盛
item.description: 截至7月3日的一周内，投资者囤积了大量美国股票基金，因为数据显示经济疲软以及美国联邦储备委员会主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的鸽派评论巩固了降息预期。【原文：Investors hoovered up U.S. equity funds in the week to July 3 as data indicating a softening economy and U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's dovish commentary solidified rate cut expectations.】

item.title: 欧洲顶级干邑制造商将出席中国反倾销调查会议 - 消息人士
item.description: 一位业内人士称，欧洲主要干邑生产商将于 7 月 18 日在北京出席中国对该行业进行反倾销调查的听证会，这是自今年早些时候调查开始以来他们首次有机会亲自为自己辩护。【原文：Leading European cognac producers will attend a hearing on China's anti-dumping probe of the industry in Beijing on July 18 - their first chance to defend themselves in person since the investigation began earlier this year, an industry source said.】

item.title: Epic Games 称苹果公司拖延在欧洲推出游戏商店
item.description: "堡垒之夜》制造商 Epic Games 周五表示，苹果公司正在阻碍其在欧洲的 iPhone 和 iPad 上建立游戏商店的尝试，这是科技巨头控制 iOS 应用生态系统的激烈争斗的最新升级。【原文："Fortnite" maker Epic Games said on Friday Apple was impeding its attempts to set up a games store on iPhones and iPads in Europe, the latest escalation in a bitter feud over the technology giant's control of the iOS app ecosystem.】

item.title: 降息预期升温，全球股票基金连续两周吸引资金流入
item.description: 截至7月3日的一周内，全球投资者纷纷投入股票基金，原因是在经济指标疲软和美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔发表鸽派言论后，市场预期美国将降息。【原文：Global investors piled into equity funds in the week to July 3 on expectations of U.S. rate cuts following weaker economic indicators and dovish remarks from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 欧盟称威士卡和万事达卡将把非欧盟卡收费上限延长至 2029 年
item.description: 欧盟委员会周五表示，威士（Visa）和万事达（Mastercard）将把五年前与欧盟反垄断监管机构达成的旅游卡收费上限再延长五年，至 2029 年。【原文：Visa and Mastercard will extend caps on tourist card fees agreed five years ago with EU antitrust regulators by another five years to 2029, the European Commission said on Friday.】

item.title: 国泰航空回购香港政府剩余的 50%优先股
item.description: 香港国泰航空公司周五表示，将回购 7 月 31 日发行给香港特区政府的剩余 50% 优先股。【原文：Hong Kong's Cathay Pacific Airways will buy back the remaining 50% of preference shares that were issued to the Hong Kong SAR Government on July 31, the company said on Friday.】

item.title: 中国监管机构誓言严厉打击资本市场欺诈行为
item.description: 中国证券监管机构周五誓言将加大对金融欺诈的打击力度，并表示正在推动对违法者实施更严厉的惩罚，以重振人们对中国陷入困境的股市的信心。【原文：China's securities regulator vowed on Friday to clamp down harder on financial fraud, saying it is pushing for harsher punishment against lawbreakers as it seeks to revive confidence in the country's struggling stock markets.】

item.title: 汽车制造商回应欧盟对中国产电动汽车征收关税
item.description: 随着欧盟对中国生产的电动汽车（EV）征收额外关税的措施于周五生效，一些汽车制造商一直在考虑是否提高价格或采取其他应对措施。【原文：With the European Union's extra duties on Chinese-made electric vehicles (EVs) taking effect on Friday, some carmakers have been considering whether to raise their prices or take other measures in response.】

item.title: 欧盟要求亚马逊提供更多有关数字服务法案合规性的信息
item.description: 欧盟委员会周五表示，已要求亚马逊提供更多信息，说明这家美国电子商务巨头为履行《数字服务法案》（DSA）义务所采取的措施。【原文：The European Commission said on Friday it had requesting Amazon provide more information on the measures the U.S. e-commerce giant has taken to comply with its Digital Services Act (DSA) obligations.】

item.title: 美国银行称，由于高收益率的吸引，债券获得 2021 年以来最大的单周资金流入量
item.description: 美国银行周五在一份研究报告中称，截至本周三的一周内，投资者向债券基金投入了 190 亿美元，这是自 2021 年 2 月以来的最大流入量，因为他们锁定了高收益率。【原文：Investors poured $19 billion into bond funds in the week to Wednesday, the biggest inflow since February 2021, as they locked in high yields, Bank of America said in a research note on Friday.】

item.title: 新奥首席财务官冯仑卸任，电动汽车制造商任命内部人士为继任者
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商尼奥周五表示，史蒂文-魏峰（Steven Wei Feng）因个人原因已辞去首席财务官一职，即刻生效。【原文：China-based electric automaker Nio said on Friday Steven Wei Feng has stepped down as its chief financial officer, effective immediately, citing personal reasons.】

item.title: 独家报道欧洲就中国老一代芯片征求业界意见
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，欧盟委员会已开始征求该地区半导体行业对中国扩大生产老一代计算机芯片的意见。【原文：The European Commission has begun canvassing the region's semiconductor industry for its views on China's expanded production of older generation computer chips, two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 财报季考验股市大涨希望
item.description: 未来几周，随着投资者了解其他公司的利润增长是否开始赶上科技相关领军企业，美股涨势将超越英伟达等巨型公司的希望将面临考验。【原文：Hopes that the U.S. stocks rally will broaden beyond megacaps like Nvidia will be tested in coming weeks as investors learn whether profit growth from other companies is starting to catch up with that of the tech-related leaders.】

item.title: 债券市场重新关注美国大选，2024 年反弹希望破灭
item.description: 随着 11 月的临近，对美国总统大选结果的重新调整正促使债券投资者押注收益率将在更长时间内保持较高水平。【原文：A recalibration of how the U.S. presidential election plays out is causing bond investors to bet yields stay higher for longer as November approaches.】

item.title: 早间新闻聚焦劳工--美国就业、英国新政府
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 在关键的薪资数据公布前，期货走高
item.description: 本周结束时，美国股指期货小幅上扬，经济疲软的迹象提高了人们对 9 月份降息的希望，投资者在 7 月 4 日假期结束后正准备迎接另一份关键的就业报告。【原文：U.S. stock index futures inched up at the end of a week that saw signs of a softening economy raising hopes of an interest rate cut in September, with investors gearing up for yet another key employment report after returning from a July 4th holiday.】

item.title: 美联储威廉姆斯：实现 2% 的通胀目标仍 "任重道远
item.description: 纽约联储银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）周五表示，美联储在将通胀率重新降至 2% 的目标方面取得了长足进步，但距离实现目标仍有 "一段距离"。【原文：The Federal Reserve has taken great strides in lowering inflation back down toward its 2% target rate but is still "a way" from achieving the goal, New York Fed Bank President John Williams said on Friday.】

item.title: 比亚迪电动车在泰国大幅打折引发反弹，泰国总理寻求保证
item.description: 泰国消费者保护机构自开始调查比亚迪经销商积极打折的行为以来，已收到约 70 起投诉，一些买家认为他们多付了中国电动汽车的价格。【原文：Thailand's consumer protection agency has received about 70 complaints since initiating a probe into aggressive discounting by BYD , dealers that has left some buyers feeling they overpaid for their Chinese electric vehicles.】

item.title: 上海多家中国国有企业购买特斯拉 Y 型汽车
item.description: 当地政府周五发表声明称，中国金融中心上海的几家国有企业最近购买了特斯拉最畅销的 Model Y 作为服务用车。【原文：Several state-owned firms in China's financial hub of Shanghai have recently purchased Tesla 's best-selling Model Y as service cars, a local government statement said on Friday.】

item.title: 尽管受到美国制裁，中国人工智能企业仍在人工智能大会上展示韧性与创新
item.description: 从行业巨头到雄心勃勃的初创企业，中国科技公司本周齐聚上海世界人工智能大会，展示其最新创新成果，并表达了对中国人工智能行业的大力支持，即使该行业面临美国制裁。【原文：Chinese tech companies, from industry giants to ambitious startups, converged at the World AI Conference in Shanghai this week to showcase their latest innovations and express strong support for the country's artificial intelligence sector even as it faces U.S. sanctions.】

item.title: 富士康第二季度收入同比增长 19%，第三季度有望实现增长
item.description: 全球最大的合约电子制造商、苹果公司最大的 iPhone 组装商--台湾富士康周五公布，其第二季度营收同比增长 19%，并预计第三季度营收将同比增长。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn, the world's largest contract electronics maker and Apple's biggest iPhone assembler, reported on Friday its second-quarter revenue jumped 19% year-on-year, and predicted third-quarter revenue would rise year-on-year.】

item.title: 丰田在认证调查中未发现新的不当行为
item.description: 日本汽车制造商丰田汽车周五在一份声明中说，除了上个月已经报告的案例外，丰田汽车在其车型的认证申请中没有发现任何新的不当行为。【原文：Toyota Motor did not find any new cases of wrongdoing in the certification applications of its car models beyond the ones it had already reported last month, the Japanese automaker said in a statement on Friday.】

item.title: 中国央行可动用数千亿元人民币债券为多头反弹降温
item.description: 中国央行周五告诉路透社记者，中国央行有价值数千亿元人民币的债券可供借贷，并将根据市场情况出售这些债券。【原文：China's central bank has hundreds of billions of yuan worth of bonds at its disposal to borrow, and will sell them depending on market conditions, the bank told Reuters on Friday, part of a plan markets see as an effort to cool a powerful bond rally.】

item.title: 壳牌将对新加坡和鹿特丹工厂进行高达 20 亿美元的减记
item.description: 壳牌周五表示，在出售新加坡炼油厂和暂停欧洲最大生物燃料厂之一的建设后，壳牌将计提高达 20 亿美元的减值费用。【原文：Shell will take an impairment charge of up to $2 billion after the sale of its Singapore refinery and pausing of construction of one of Europe's largest biofuel plants, it said on Friday.】

item.title: 英美资源集团延长受火灾影响的澳大利亚矿山工人的薪资
item.description: 澳大利亚矿业与能源工会（Mining And Energy Union）与英美资源集团（Anglo American）达成协议，将本周早些时候因地下火灾而关闭的格罗夫纳煤矿工人的工资延长至8月底。【原文：Australia's Mining And Energy Union has reached an agreement with Anglo American to extend pay until August-end for workers at its Grosvenor mine that was shut earlier this week due to an ongoing underground fire, the two parties said.】

item.title: 阿托斯称通过银团协议获得短期融资
item.description: 法国技术公司阿托斯（Atos）周五表示，该公司已通过债权人提供的两批贷款成功获得了短期融资，并表示仍有望在本月达成最终重组协议。【原文：French technology company Atos said on Friday it had successfully secured short-term financing via two tranches of loans from creditors, adding it still expected to reach a final restructuring agreement this month.】

item.title: 中国正努力利用储能技术的蓬勃发展，呼吁更多储能技术的应用。
item.description: 在中国山东省的一片荒芜的泥地上，一排排看似薄薄的白色集装箱一字排开。【原文：Rows of what look like thin, white shipping containers are lined up on a barren dirt field in China's Shandong province.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车电池制造商在储能领域的实力如何？
item.description: 中国的电动汽车电池巨头 CATL 300750.SZ 和比亚迪 002594.SZ 正紧盯日益增长的固定储能市场。【原文：China's EV battery giants CATL 300750.SZ and BYD 002594.SZ are eyeing the growing market for stationary energy storage.】
